alert.note: Alert for Butler; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 12:53AM CST until January 09 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Butler County in south central Alabama... North central Monroe County in south central Alabama... Southeastern Wilcox County in south central Alabama... * Until 130 AM CST. * At 1253 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Vredenburgh, or 15 miles south of Camden, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Beatrice, Vredenburgh, and Pine Apple. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CST for south central Alabama.
